properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 1 at 9:55AM CDT expiring November 1 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southern Crenshaw County in south central Alabama...
Northeastern Covington County in south central Alabama...

* Until 1045 AM CDT.

* At 955 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Andalusia,
moving northeast at 40 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Andalusia, Opp, Brantley, Dozier, Heath and Gantt.
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
